params.title: Haier 310 L Frost Free Double Door Refrigerator

description.text: This technology helps in bringing the freezer temperature down to -5° C in about 60 minutes. As a result, the fridge makes ice cubes really fast.

Thanks to this innovative feature, cold air reaches every nook and cranny of the fridge, thus cooling it uniformly. In addition, this feature also helps the fridge maintain an optimum humidity level. It also ensures that there is no air blockage. All this helps in taking the pressure off the compressor, so it runs with less wear and tear.
If your area faces a lot of voltage fluctuations, you don’t need to worry about it affecting your fridge’s operations. This fridge can operate safely and stably within a range of 135 - 290 V.
Since this fridge comes with a child lock, it prevents your kids from sneaking out food behind your back.
Featuring a host of innovative technologies and a massive storage space, this double-door Haier refrigerator helps you keep your food fresh, healthy and tasty for a long duration.

value.author: aravind ajith
value.text: Great product! Ample space for everything!
value.title: Awesome!

value.description: The 'Flipkart Assured' badge is a seal of quality and speed. Products with this badge meet our extensive quality & packaging guidelines along with having faster delivery times.

value.text: Featuring the 1 Hour Icing technology, this double-door refrigerator from Haier makes ice cubes really fast. Its 360° Air Flow feature ensures that all the levels of the fridge are uniformly cooled without taxing the compressor. Also, this fridge can work stably even during high voltage fluctuations without an external stabilizer.
